entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm and freezing rain. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h then light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
